name: RPS.Drag
description:
Drag fast in this fast-paced online-leaderboard game! Drag rocks into scissors, and scissors into paper, paper into rocks and etc to get a point! If you drag an object into something it'll lose to however, you lose a point! And you better drag fast, before the timer above runs out! Because if it does, you lose!

Try to get the highest score, and be at the top of the online leaderboard!

Credits
  • Created for the 14th ScoreSpace jam.
  • Assembled sounds from Freesound to make new ones. All the sounds were CC0 licensed.
  • Wood texture from ambientCG. CC0 licensed.
  • Online leaderboard hosted by Infamy.
  • Everything else is created by me, jackomix.
